commenter_a: That's the problem, she just let 4 Americans die, you idiot.
post_message: Whoopi Goldberg: Gee, so sorry that you find the deaths of innocent Americans "boring." But for the rest of America, we find the Benghazi massacre reprehensible and unforgivable. And on behalf of the families who can never see or hug their loved ones ever again, We the People demand transparency, honesty, and justice. So get over yourself and your need for constant amusement, Whoopi. Hillary lied, Americans died. Signed, We the People

commenter_b: Illegal immigrants must not vote. That is against the law. All people must be made to show ID to make sure illegal immigrants are not voting and to make sure nobody votes more than once. It is simple common sense. For the very rare citizen who may not have ID they can assist them and pay the fees. It would only be a very few people. But everybody must show ID to vote and prevent voter fraud.
commenter_a: Why do judges think only black people don't have IDs and considering everyone needs an ID for just about anything else, why would anyone not have an ID? All this law does is make sure there is not voter fraud...so in essence this ruling shows me that the court wants voter fraud, it's the only thing that makes logical sense. I think it may be time for other countries to oversee our democratic process or we need to stop telling them we will oversee theirs because we obviously have no moral high ground to speak on the subject in other countries.

commenter_a: Every last illegal immigrant in this country should be deported and all charged with a felony for being illegally here. If they come back again, charge the immigrant with two felonies and put them in prison, then deport them again when their sentence is up. If there is a third time for the immigrant to come back, give the natural life sentence. People that come here, should do so legally.
